title: MD
biography: Sir Mark Jeremy Walport is a British medical scientist and was the Government Chief Scientific Adviser in the United Kingdom from 2013 to 2017 and Chief Executive of UK Research and Innovation (UKRI) from 2017 to 2020. In 2023 he became the Foreign Secretary of The Royal Society.
aiSummary: Mark Walport is a immunology specialist with an H-index of 83 at Wellcome Trust (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Nature, Nature Genetics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
